name: docker-api
description: Interact with the Docker Engine API to list/inspect/start/stop containers, list images, fetch container logs, and retrieve container resource stats. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access. HIGH RISK: includes command whitelisting for container exec.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: docker_api
toolDefinition.description: Interact with the Docker Engine API to manage containers, images, logs, and stats. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK). HIGH RISK: includes container ID sanitization to prevent injection.

action.description: list_containers (list all containers), get_container (inspect a container), start_container (start a stopped container), stop_container (stop a running container), list_images (list Docker images), get_logs (get container logs), container_stats (get container resource stats)

containerId.description: Container ID or name (alphanumeric, hyphens, underscores, dots; max 128 chars). Required for get_container, start_container, stop_container, get_logs, container_stats.

all.description: Include stopped containers in list_containers (default false).

limit.description: Number of results to return for list_containers and list_images (1-100, default 25).

timeout.description: Seconds to wait before killing the container for stop_container (0-300, default 10).

tail.description: Number of log lines to return for get_logs (1-1000, default 100).

timestamps.description: Include timestamps in log output for get_logs (default true).
